analysis_notes: Images were analyzed visually. Each unique image shows a specific type of cheesecake. The goal is to map each image to the recipe it best matches.

banana-cream-cheesecake.png.shows: Banana cream cheesecake with banana slices on top, whipped cream, bananas in background
banana-cream-cheesecake.png.notes: This image is currently duplicated as classic-vanilla-bean-cheesecake.png but shows BANANA not vanilla

blueberry-swirl-cheesecake.png.shows: Blueberry swirl cheesecake with fresh blueberries on top, purple swirls

strawberry-swirl-cheesecake.png.shows: Strawberry swirl cheesecake with pink swirls, fresh strawberries

key-lime-cheesecake.png.shows: Key lime cheesecake with green tint, limes in background, lime zest

chocolate-peanut-butter-cheesecake.png.shows: Layered chocolate and peanut butter cheesecake with PB cup on top, peanut butter jar in background
chocolate-peanut-butter-cheesecake.png.notes: This is a peanut butter cheesecake image

cheesecake-stuffed-strawberries.png.shows: Strawberries stuffed with cream cheese filling, chocolate drizzle
cheesecake-stuffed-strawberries.png.notes: This image shows stuffed strawberries, not funfetti dip - MISMATCH
